Detailed Description

MGPoint represents one dimensional manifold, a point in a space.

See MGPosition class, whic is recommended to use usually.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const MGPoint &  P,
size_t  start1 = 0,
size_t  start2 = 0 
)

Construct a point by changing the space dimension or ordering the space dimension element.

Parameters:
sdim new space dimension.
P original point.
start1 start position coordinate of new point.
start2 start position coordinate of the original.

Member Function Documentation

MGPosition MGPoint::center (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return minimum box that includes the geometry of parameter interval.

入力のパラメータ範囲の曲線部分を囲むボックスを返す。 Obtain ceter coordinate of the geometry.

Implements MGGeometry.

MGUnit_vector MGPoint::direction ( const MGPosition &  param  )  const [virtual]

Compute direction unit vector of the geometry.

For the point, this is undefined.

Reimplemented from MGGeometry.

void MGPoint::draw3DVertex (  )  const [virtual]

Draw 3D point(vertex) in world coordinates.

The object is converted to point(s) and is drawn. This is valid only for topology objects or MGPoint.

Reimplemented from MGGeometry.

void MGPoint::drawWire ( double  span_length,
int  line_density = 1 
) const [virtual]

Draw 3D curve in world coordinates.

The object is converted to curve(s) and is drawn.

Parameters:
span_length Line segment span length.
line_density line density to draw a surface in wire mode.

Implements MGObject.

MGVector MGPoint::evaluate ( const MGPosition &  t,
const size_t *  nderiv = 0 
) const [inline, virtual]

Evaluate n'th derivative data. n=0 means positional data evaluation.

Parameters:
t Parameter value, t's space dimension is geometry's manifold dimension.
nderiv Order of derivative of i-th parameter in nderiv[i], When nderiv=null, nderiv[i]=0 is assumed for all i.

Implements MGGeometry.

MGisects MGPoint::intersection ( const MGObject &  obj2  )  const [inline, virtual]

Compute the intersections of two objects.

Intersections are obtained from two objects, which are known using the MGisects::object1() and object2(). NOTE**** When two objects' manifold dimension are the same, object1 is this object at the invocation of MGObject::intersection(), and object2 is the argument object. However, their manifold dimension are not the same, object1 is always the lower dimension's object and object2 is the higer dimension's object.

Implements MGObject.

void MGPoint::negate_transform ( MGGeometry &  boundary  )  const [inline, virtual]

Transform the coordinates of boundary of this geometry so that new coordinate of boundary is the same coordinate as the new one of this geometry after negate() of this geometry is done.

That is, boundary coordinates are parameter world of this geometry.

Implements MGGeometry.

bool MGPoint::on ( const MGPosition &  P,
MGPosition &  param 
) const

Test if given point is on the geometry or not.

If yes, return parameter value of the geometry. Even if not, return nearest point's parameter. 指定点が自身上にあるかを調べる。曲線上にあれば，そのパラメーター値を， なくても最近傍点のパラメータ値を返す。 Function's return value is >0 if the point is on the geometry, and 0 if the point is not on the geometry.

Parameters:
P Point(指定点)
param Parameter of the geometry(パラメータ)
MGPoint& MGPoint::operator= ( const MGGel &  gel2  )  [virtual]

Assignment.

When the leaf object of this and obj2 are not equal, this assignment does nothing.

Reimplemented from MGGel.

MGPosition MGPoint::parameter ( const MGPosition &  P  )  const

Compute parameter value of given point.

自身の上の指定点を表すパラメータ値を返す。 If input point is not on the geometry, return the nearest point on the geometry.

Parameters:
P Point(指定点)
MGPosition MGPoint::range ( const MGPosition &  t  )  const

Round t into geometry's parameter range.

入力パラメータをパラメータ範囲でまるめて返却する。
